metadata.title: CVE-2023-28755 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A ReDoS issue was discovered in the URI component through 0.12.0 in Rubythrough 3.2.1. The URI parser mishandles invalid URLs that have specificcharacters. It causes an increase in execution time for parsing strings toURI objects. The fixed versions are 0.12.1, 0.11.1, 0.10.2 and 0.10.0.1.

criterions.comment: ruby2.3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
jruby: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
